fields_of_interest: Taxation, European Neighbourhood Policy, Fraud prevention
head_office_address: Calle de Garcia de paredes, 94 planta 1º B
inter_groups: changes in the tax policy, directive and publications in directives relative to taxes, both of companies and person.  We will convene or attend a range of meetings or events which are relevant to tax matters. This includes meetings with Parliamentarians, Commissioners and Officials across all EU institutions as well as run, speak or attend a range of conferences or events relating to tax policy which impacts our business and our customers.
eu_initiatives: changes in the tax policy, directive and publications in directives relative to taxes, both of companies and persons

This includes meetings with Parliamentarians, Commissioners and Officials across all EU institutions as well as run, speak or attend a range of conferences or events relating to tax policy which impacts our business and our customers.
goals__remit: We have experience in international taxation, offering assistance to companies in their projects and cross-border investments or internationalization processes of their activity and to foreign companies that decide to invest in national territory. Our international experience allows us to provide advice on tax optimization of projects and taxation of Non-residents.
